sub_title: Learning & Development Specialist with over 8 years experience of onboarding, people development, program management, learning & development strategy implementation, recruitment, HR core systems and global mobility
summary:
I am an experienced learning and development professional looking for an opportunity to drive the learning experience for a new organization. I have proven results in defining, designing and delivering strategic learning solutions that positively impact business results by increasing employee performance and engagement. I am self-driven learning & development specialist developing and updating training content in e-learning platforms, tracking training progress and achieved results. 
Achievements: 

 - In-depth experience in Global mobility services; Onboard customers about their relocation package, act as relocation project manager and taking responsibilities for the whole process. Providing constant support to clients worldwide, working side by side with company’s trusted partners. 
- Defining and implementing Onboarding training plan regarding business processes, product updates, business tools and platforms
- Develop, monitor and coordinate Training Assessment center
- Develop, deliver and update Customer onboarding programs
- Induction and training roadmap program reduced the time for new joiners to achieve the productivity and quality KPI targets from an average of 6 to 4 months
- The onboarding program at GfK reduced coding error rates for new employees from 22% to 8% in 3 months by introducing a four eyes principle, feedback loops and targeted training for common mistakes: GfK 2014

education.field_of_study: Translator - Editor from English to Bulgarian and from Bulgarian to English

education.grade: Bulgarian Philology and state qualification for teacher in high schools

projects.title: Induction program
projects.description: The first training project i have done was Induction program. I  have welcomed new colleagues with the Onboarding training and they had my full support throughout their carrier adventure. We ensured smooth and easy introduction to company culture for new joiners. They were well prepared and ready for the next steps.

contributors.headline: Learning & Development Specialist with over 8 years experience of onboarding, people development, program management, learning & development strategy implementation, recruitment, HR core systems and global mobility

projects.title: Management Leadership Program
projects.description: It contained 12 training sessions in soft skills area. In each session we had interactive part. The theory was implemented in various games we did together. Between every session participants had assignments with different problems to solve taken from real working experience. 70%  from all participants got promoted. They had their career growth within 12 months time after they have started the program

contributors.headline: Learning & Development Specialist with over 8 years experience of onboarding, people development, program management, learning & development strategy implementation, recruitment, HR core systems and global mobility

projects.title: Map of success
projects.description: The management training brand Map of success contained 12 training sessions and in between each session participants received additional materials, tests and tasks to solve for the next session. My training tool was the company e-learning software. We achieved 22% higher customer satisfaction as result of highly motivated managers accomplished the program.

contributors.headline: Learning & Development Specialist with over 8 years experience of onboarding, people development, program management, learning & development strategy implementation, recruitment, HR core systems and global mobility

profile_positions.description:
I am part of the Global Excellence Team and I am working with global customers in key business industries. I am responsible for their employees’ relocation and for providing the needed onboarding tools and knowledge throughout the process. 
- Constant tailored made services, listening the customer’s needs and provide solutions. 
- Achieving 99% customer satisfaction due to constant communication, full transparency policy
profile_positions.title: Global Assignment Consultant

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for developing and updating the training content in the platform, use all the system tools to measure training progress and give overall evaluation score

•	Develop and conduct tailor made training programs for different educational entities 
•	Develop and conduct Leadership programs for small to medium size companies in retail and finance. 
•	Analyze data, screen processes and evaluate the business needs in order to recommend and implement improvements a business group e-learning platform
•	Developed and deployed tailor-made training courses and e-learning solutions
•	Conducted onboarding, leadership, train the trainer, soft and hard skills courses 
•	Evaluation, recommendation and rollout of e-learning content, including multimedia and interactive training
profile_positions.title: Training Expert

profile_positions.description:
I worked as part of the business group HR team that served 8,000 employees and associates in over 400 offices in Bulgaria, Romania, Poland and Ukraine. Our team was involved in Global strategy implementation plan with different policies, training programs, corporate initiatives.  I have:

•	Develop and manage Global Training Programs translating the company strategy into people development plan 
•	Developed, delivered and updated Customer Onboarding Program focused on software features and functionality, mobile applications related with financial products  
•	Developed and delivered the “Map of success” Leadership Development Program in line with the global strategy of improving standards and client satisfaction
•	Ownership and continuous improvement of the Group onboarding program for new joiners
•	Launching and managing the Business training platform
•	Conducted job interviews for senior management roles and supported middle management with recruitment training
•	Compiled comprehensive training reports that detailed learning objectives, attendance, assessment scores, training expenditures and return on investment
profile_positions.title: Learning & Development Business Group Executive

profile_positions.description:
As part of the Global HR team, I was responsible for managing all people development requirements for an offshore operations team of approximately 400 employees and supported with general office and HR administration. I have developed and implemented HR programs and initiatives that supported the Global strategy. I have incorporated the Global strategy into people individual training plans 

•	Saba e-learning platform for content, tracking and delivery of online courses
•	Part of the HR team responsible for HR core systems implementation 
•	Created and facilitated a comprehensive 6 months onboarding program for new joiners
•	Monitored, evaluated and recorded training effectiveness
•	Collaborated with managers to develop and keep training material relevant
•	Rollout of Bulgarian training content to global offshoring teams in Romania, India, Malaysia and Chile
•	HR administration including recruitment, documentation and organising company events
•	Part of the HR team assisting with smooth transition to the new HR software
profile_positions.title: Global Learning & Development Specialist

profile_positions.description: I was organizing and participating in online conferences with key international clients. I made sure that all agreed action points are met within the deadlines. I was doing daily maintenance of employee software in 4 offshoring centers. I was organizing conferences and team buildings worldwide.
profile_positions.title: Global Management Assistant

profile_positions.description: I collected debts via phone calls. My task was to persuade the debtors to compound their debts on consumer credits and credit cards. All debtors were +12 months default in paying. I managed to collect 9.9 million BGN on monthly basis. I have acquired very good knowledge of European and Bulgarian bank legislation.
profile_positions.title: Collector
